verify.title: Check your email for a security code
verify.emailHasBeenSent: This step helps keep GC Forms secure by verifying your account each time you sign in.

resendConfirmationCode.title: Check your email
resendConfirmationCode.body: An email with a verification code has been sent to you

error.expired: Code expired. Try signing in again.

reVerify.title: Send new code
reVerify.description: Sometimes email messages take a few minutes to arrive. If you do not receive the email, you can send a new code.
